Content:: Lo Moon is the self-titled debut studio album from the Los Angeles-based band Lo Moon.[1] It was released on February 23, 2018. Lo Moon was met with "generally favorable" reviews from critics. At Metacritic, which assigns a weighted average rating out of 100 to reviews from mainstream publications, this release received an average score of 73, based on 7 reviews.[2] Aggregator Album of the Year gave the release a 70 out of 100 based on a critical consensus of 9 reviews.[6]  This 2010s album–related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
